00018     TrackerSD::TrackerSD(G4String name, G4String theCollectionName, int subdetID, DetectorID* detID) :
00019             G4VSensitiveDetector(name), hitsCollection_(0), subdetID_(subdetID), detID_(detID) {
00020 
00021         // Add the collection name to vector of names.
00022         this->collectionName.push_back(theCollectionName);
00023 
00024         // Register this SD with the manager.
00025         G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->AddNewDetector(this);
00026 
00027         // Set the subdet ID as it will always be the same for every hit.
00028         detID_->setFieldValue("subdet", subdetID_);
00029     }
00030 
00031     TrackerSD::~TrackerSD() {
00032         delete detID_;
00033     }
00034 
00035     G4bool TrackerSD::ProcessHits(G4Step* aStep, G4TouchableHistory*) {
00036 
00037         // Determine if current particle of this step is a Geantino.
00038         G4ParticleDefinition* pdef = aStep->GetTrack()->GetDefinition();
00039         bool isGeantino = false;
00040         if (pdef == G4Geantino::Definition() || pdef == G4ChargedGeantino::Definition()) {
00041             isGeantino = true;
00042         }
00043 
00044         // Get the edep from the step.
00045         G4double edep = aStep->GetTotalEnergyDeposit();
00046 
00047         // Skip steps with no energy dep which come from non-Geantino particles.
00048         if (edep == 0.0 && !isGeantino) {
00049             if (verboseLevel > 2) {
00050                 std::cout << "TrackerSD skipping step with zero edep" << std::endl << std::endl;
00051             }
00052             return false;
00053         }
00054 
00055         // Create a new hit object.
00056         G4TrackerHit* hit = new G4TrackerHit();
00057 
00058         // Assign track ID for finding the SimParticle in post event processing.
00059         hit->setTrackID(aStep->GetTrack()->GetTrackID());
00060 
00061         // Set the edep.
00062         hit->setEdep(edep);
00063 
00064         // Set the start position.
00065         G4StepPoint* prePoint = aStep->GetPreStepPoint();
00066         //hit->setStartPosition(prePoint->GetPosition());
00067 
00068         // Set the end position.
00069         G4StepPoint* postPoint = aStep->GetPostStepPoint();
00070         //hit->setEndPosition(postPoint->GetPosition());
00071 
00072         G4ThreeVector start = prePoint->GetPosition();
00073         G4ThreeVector end = postPoint->GetPosition();
00074 
00075         // Set the mid position.
00076         G4ThreeVector mid = 0.5 * (start + end);
00077         hit->setPosition(mid.x(), mid.y(), mid.z());
00078 
00079         // Compute path length.
00080         G4double pathLength = sqrt(pow(start.x() - end.x(), 2) + pow(start.y() - end.y(), 2) + pow(start.z() - end.z(), 2));
00081         hit->setPathLength(pathLength);
00082 
00083         // Set the global time.
00084         hit->setTime(aStep->GetTrack()->GetGlobalTime());
00085 
00086         /*
00087          * Compute and set the momentum.
00088          */
00089         /*
00090          double mag = (prePoint->GetMomentum().mag() + postPoint->GetMomentum().mag()) / 2;
00091          G4ThreeVector p = (postPoint->GetPosition() - prePoint->GetPosition());
00092          if (mag > 0) {
00093          p.setMag(mag);
00094          }
00095          */
00096         G4ThreeVector p = postPoint->GetMomentum();
00097         hit->setMomentum(p.x(), p.y(), p.z());
00098 
00099         /*
00100          * Set the 32-bit ID on the hit.
00101          */
00102         int layerNumber = prePoint->GetTouchableHandle()->GetHistory()->GetVolume(2)->GetCopyNo();
00103         detID_->setFieldValue(1, layerNumber);
00104         hit->setID(detID_->pack());
00105         hit->setLayerID(layerNumber);
00106 
00107         /*
00108          * Debug print.
00109          */
00110         if (this->verboseLevel > 2) {
00111             std::cout << "Created new SimTrackerHit in detector " << this->GetName() << " with subdet ID " << subdetID_ << " and layer " << layerNumber << " ..." << std::endl;
00112             hit->Print();
00113             std::cout << std::endl;
00114         }
00115 
00116         // Insert hit into current hits collection.
00117         hitsCollection_->insert(hit);
00118 
00119         return true;
00120     }
00121 
00122     void TrackerSD::Initialize(G4HCofThisEvent* hce) {
00123 
00124         // Setup hits collection and the HC ID.
00125         hitsCollection_ = new G4TrackerHitsCollection(SensitiveDetectorName, collectionName[0]);
00126         int hcID = G4SDManager::GetSDMpointer()->GetCollectionID(collectionName[0]);
00127         hce->AddHitsCollection(hcID, hitsCollection_);
00128     }
00129 
00130     void TrackerSD::EndOfEvent(G4HCofThisEvent*) {
00131 
00132         // Print number of hits.
00133         if (this->verboseLevel > 0) {
00134             std::cout << GetName() << " had " << hitsCollection_->entries() << " hits in event" << std::endl;
00135         }
00136 
00137         // Print each hit in hits collection.
00138         if (this->verboseLevel > 1) {
00139             for (unsigned iHit = 0; iHit < hitsCollection_->GetSize(); iHit++) {
00140                 (*hitsCollection_)[iHit]->Print();
00141             }
00142         }
00143     }
00144
